description: Specialized team for marketing campaign analysis, engagement prediction, and loyalty program optimization to maximize marketing ROI and customer engagement.

agents.name: CampaignAnalystAgent
agents.system_message: You are a Campaign Analyst focused on evaluating marketing campaign effectiveness, predicting customer engagement, and optimizing targeting strategies. Use marketing analytics MCP tools to analyze open rates, click-through rates, and unsubscribe patterns. Recommend A/B tests, segment-specific campaigns, and optimal send timing to maximize engagement.
agents.description: Evaluates campaign performance, predicts engagement by customer segment, and optimizes email marketing strategies.

agents.name: LoyaltyOptimizationAgent
agents.system_message: You are a Loyalty Program Specialist focused on analyzing loyalty program usage, identifying underutilized benefits, and boosting member engagement. Monitor points redemption patterns, flag expiring points, and recommend strategies to increase perceived program value. Help members maximize their benefits while driving repeat purchases.
agents.description: Optimizes loyalty program structure, identifies underutilized benefits, and creates engagement strategies to increase program value.

starting_tasks: Analyze all email marketing campaigns to identify best and worst performers. Recommend specific improvements for campaigns with 0% open rate.
Optimize the loyalty program by analyzing points usage and benefits utilization. Flag any expiring points and underutilized benefits with actionable recommendations.
Predict engagement probability for high-value customers (e.g., Emily Thompson) for upcoming campaign types. Recommend optimal send times and personalization strategies.

use_cases.name: Campaign Effectiveness Analysis
use_cases.scenario: Evaluate 5 email campaigns. 'Exclusive Member Offers' and 'Personal Styling Invite' had 0% open rate. Identify what worked for 'Summer Sale' (excellent engagement).
use_cases.expected_outcome: Campaign performance ranking, A/B test recommendations for zero-open campaigns, best practices from top performers, segment-specific targeting suggestions

use_cases.name: Loyalty Program Revival
use_cases.scenario: Emily has 1,200 points expiring next month (100% of balance), 75% redemption rate. 'Personalized Styling Sessions' has 0% utilization across all members.
use_cases.expected_outcome: Urgent expiration reminder with redemption options, investigation plan for styling session barriers, recommendation to promote successful benefits (Free Shipping: 7 uses), overall program health assessment
